passiton.name: Donation of Solid Wood Sofa Set (3+1+1) – Jurong East
passiton.description:
I would like to bless and donate a solid wood sofa set (3-seater + two 1-seaters) in good, usable condition through the Pass-It-On programme.

Item details:

Origin: Zen Tradition

Material: Solid, heavy wood with firm cushion seats

Condition: Gently used, structurally strong, minor wear on fabric edges

Includes: Main seat cushions only (small decorative cushions in photo not included)

Colour: Beige-gold fabric with dark wood frame. I will also include an additional spare set of cushion covers in red too

Quantity: 1 set (3 + 1 + 1)


Pickup details:

Location: Jurong East (lift accessible)

Preferred collection: By end of Oct (flexible on timing)

I can assist with coordination for movers or charity pickup. By the way, need to arrange for movers because only my elderly parents in the house.
passiton.location: Boon Lay, Jurong, Tuas

name: Side Table
description: Young couple with limited income and unstable employment, currently supported by Whampoa Family Service Centre (KKCS). The family is expecting a baby girl in November 2025 and is seeking a small, sturdy side table to place their floor fan safely and create more usable space in their one-room flat. Pre-loved tables in good, stable condition are welcome, as long as they are clean and free from major damage. As the item is medium-sized, donors are encouraged to deliver it directly to the client’s home. Please contact Social Worker Harry from Whampoa Family Service Centre (KKCS) for delivery coordination and address details. Donors may arrange their own preferred delivery service for convenience. Your contribution will support a young family working hard to stabilise their home environment before their baby’s arrival.
